scripts.prepare: if [ -z "$NETLIFY" ]; then yarn workspaces run prepare; fi
scripts.lint: yarn lint:eslintrc && yarn lint:eslint && yarn lint:prettier
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces run clean && rimraf node_modules
scripts.moso:up: yarn workspace modele-social run up && yarn workspace site upgrade modele-social
scripts.i18n:check: yarn run i18n:rules:check && yarn run i18n:ui:check
scripts.i18n:translate: yarn run i18n:rules:translate && yarn run i18n:ui:translate
scripts.i18n:ui:translate: rm -rf site/source/locales/static-analysis-fr.json && yarn run i18next -c site/scripts/i18n/parser.config.js && node site/scripts/i18n/translate-ui.js
